ComicInfo.Title: No Way To Treat A Lady
ComicInfo.Summary: No Way To Treat A Lady: Black Widow has been brainwashed by Viper, and now she thinks she is a school teacher named Nancy Rushman. Spider-Man first saves her from a gang of rapists, but then they are both attacked and captured by S.H.I.E.L.D.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:50:05. [Issue ID 33452]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Spider-Man [Peter Parker],Alex (villain),Nick Fury,Viper (villain),also as Nancy Rushman],Contessa Valentina Allegro De Fontaine,Black Widow [Natasha Romanova,S.H.I.E.L.D.
